results.title: Effect of Metformin (MTF) Intervention During Pregnancy in Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS): A Systematic Review
results.text_hl: ...It was found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ treatment during pregnancy reduced the risk of @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@PIH@@@, @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@, @DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ (abnormally large birth weight), and @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm delivery@@@ compared to placebo.

citations.NLM: Kanda S, Chatha U, Odoma VA, Pitliya A, AlEdani EM, Bhangu JK, Javed K, Manshahia PK, Nahar S, Hamid P. Effect of Metformin (MTF) Intervention During Pregnancy in Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS): A Systematic Review Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e44166. PMID: 37753037
citations.BibTeX: @article{37753037, title={Effect of Metformin (MTF) Intervention During Pregnancy in Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS): A Systematic Review}, author={Kanda S and Chatha U and Odoma VA and Pitliya A and AlEdani EM and Bhangu JK and Javed K and Manshahia PK and Nahar S and Hamid P}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={8}, pages={e44166}}

results.title: Position paper of the Italian Association of Medical Diabetologists (AMD), Italian Society of Diabetology (SID), and the Italian Study Group of Diabetes in pregnancy: Metformin use in pregnancy
results.text_hl: Moreover, a per-protocol analysis revealed a reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm delivery@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ (from 10 to 2.8%; 95% CI, 0.9-13.9; p < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Sciacca L, Bianchi C, Burlina S, Formoso G, Manicardi E, Sculli MA, Resi V. Position paper of the Italian Association of Medical Diabetologists (AMD), Italian Society of Diabetology (SID), and the Italian Study Group of Diabetes in pregnancy: Metformin use in pregnancy Acta Diabetol. 2023 Jul 4;():. PMID: 37401946

results.title: Physical Exercise vs. Metformin to Improve Delivery- and Newborn-Related Outcomes Among Pregnant Women With Overweight: A Network Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: There were statistically significant differences between the baseline body mass index of the intervention groups for @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm birth@@@, with the baseline body mass index of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intervention being higher than the exercise interventions.

citations.NLM: Pascual-Morena C, Cavero-Redondo I, Álvarez-Bueno C, Martínez-Hortelano JA, Reina-Gutiérrez S, Saz-Lara A, Núñez de Arenas-Arroyo S, Martínez-Vizcaíno V. Physical Exercise vs. Metformin to Improve Delivery- and Newborn-Related Outcomes Among Pregnant Women With Overweight: A Network Meta-Analysis Front Med (Lausanne). 2021;8():796009. PMID: 34957166

results.title: Association Between Metformin Use in Early Gestational or Type 2 Diabetes in Pregnancy and Preterm Preeclampsia.
results.text_hl: Association Between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Use in Early Gestational @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@or Type 2 Diabetes@@@ in Pregnancy and @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@Preterm Preeclampsia@@@.

results.title: Lights and shadows on the use of metformin in pregnancy: from the preconception phase to breastfeeding and beyond
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ clearly preferred @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ treatment and there was no difference in the composite primary outcomes (p = 0.95), and even in the single outcomes included in the composite, severe @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@ was less common in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (p = 0.008), but @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm birth@@@ was more common in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (p = 0.04).

citations.NLM: Tosti G, Barberio A, Tartaglione L, Rizzi A, Di Leo M, Viti L, Sirico A, De Carolis S, Pontecorvi A, Lanzone A, Pitocco D. Lights and shadows on the use of metformin in pregnancy: from the preconception phase to breastfeeding and beyond Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2023;14():1176623. PMID: 37409227
citations.BibTeX: @article{37409227, title={Lights and shadows on the use of metformin in pregnancy: from the preconception phase to breastfeeding and beyond}, author={Tosti G and Barberio A and Tartaglione L and Rizzi A and Di Leo M and Viti L and Sirico A and De Carolis S and Pontecorvi A and Lanzone A and Pitocco D}, journal={Front Endocrinol (Lausanne)}, volume={14}, pages={1176623}}

results.title: Immunomodulatory Effects of Metformin Treatment in Pregnant Women With PCOS
results.text_hl: Maternal @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and the prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm birth@@@ were significantly lower in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (P < .05), as previously reported.

citations.NLM: Ryssdal M, Vanky E, Stokkeland LMT, Jarmund AH, Steinkjer B, Løvvik TS, Madssen TS, Iversen AC, Giskeødegård GF. Immunomodulatory Effects of Metformin Treatment in Pregnant Women With PCOS J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2023 Mar 14;():. PMID: 36916886

results.title: Metformin therapy in pregnancy [Zastosowanie metforminy w ciazy].
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ therapy in pregnancy [Zastosowanie metforminy w ciazy].

results.title: Gestational metformin administration in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: A systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized control studies.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ administration in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ pregnancies was associated with reduced @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm delivery@@@ risk and larger neonatal head circumference.

citations.NLM: Cao Q, Hu Y, Fu J, Huang X, Wu L, Zhang J, Huang W. Gestational metformin administration in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: A systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized control studies. J Obstet Gynaecol Res. 2021 Dec;47(12):4148-4157. PMID: 34571574

results.title: Efficacy and safety of metformin compared to insulin in gestational diabetes: a systemic review and meta-analysis of Chinese randomized controlled trials.
results.text_hl: Subgroup analysis confirmed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has better outcomes than all types of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ except for @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@RDS@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@premature birth@@@, 2 h postprandial blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, and glycated hemoglobin.

citations.NLM: Li F, Liu L, Hu Y, Marx CM, Liu W. Efficacy and safety of metformin compared to insulin in gestational diabetes: a systemic review and meta-analysis of Chinese randomized controlled trials. Int J Clin Pharm. 2022 Oct;44(5):1102-1113. PMID: 35834091
citations.BibTeX: @article{35834091, title={Efficacy and safety of metformin compared to insulin in gestational diabetes: a systemic review and meta-analysis of Chinese randomized controlled trials.}, author={Li F and Liu L and Hu Y and Marx CM and Liu W}, journal={Int J Clin Pharm}, volume={44}, number={5}, pages={1102-1113}}

results.title: Metformin in pregnancy and risk of adverse long-term outcomes: a register-based cohort study
results.text_hl: Among the secondary outcomes, increased risk of small for gestational age (SGA) was observed for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (IPTW-weighted OR 1.65, 95% CI 1.16 to 2.34); increased risk of large for gestational age, @<m>DISEASE_Premature_Birth</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm birth@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@ was observed for combination treatment.

citations.NLM: Brand KMG, Saarelainen L, Sonajalg J, Boutmy E, Foch C, Vääräsmäki M, Morin-Papunen L, Schlachter J, CLUE Study Group, Hakkarainen KM, Korhonen P. Metformin in pregnancy and risk of adverse long-term outcomes: a register-based cohort study BMJ Open Diabetes Res Care. 2022 Jan;10(1):. PMID: 34987051
